data.name: FillBitmap
desc: This structure contains all properties of a bitmap when used as FillStyle.

items.name: aBitmapMode
lines: this enum selects how an area is filled with a single bitmap.
It may be repeated, stretched or displayed with blank space around it.

items.name: aOffset
lines: This is the horizontal and vertical offset where the tile starts.
It is given in percent in relation to the width of the bitmap.

items.name: aPositionOffset
lines: Every second line (X) / row (Y) of tiles is moved the given percent of the width of the bitmap.

items.name: aRectanglePoint
lines: The RectanglePoint specifies the position inside of the bitmap to use as the top left position for rendering.

items.name: aSize
lines: This is the size of the tile for filling.
Depending on the property LogicalSize, this is either relative or absolute.

items.name: aURL
lines: a URL to the bitmap used.
This may be an internal URL of the graphics manager.

items.name: bLogicalSize
lines: specifies if the size is given in percentage or as an absolute value.
If this is TRUE, the properties SizeX and SizeY contain the size of the tile in percent of the size of the original bitmap. If this is FALSE, the size of the tile is specified with 1/100th mm.
